name: Astra 3000
description:
A VHS recording of an intro from Astra 3000 video game. 

Astra 3000 was a 1993 space-themed quest by an independent Canadian gaming studio ATIH (All This is Hoax) developed for Atari Jaguar console. 

The game has never been released and remained in the works. A VHS tape and a few prototypes of the game on corrupted floppy disks were left, allowing reconstruction of some scenes from the game. 

As for the game plot, it is still unclear what it was about because the fate of Astra 3000 creators remains unknown—nobody knows where the team vanished after ATIH declared bankruptcy. Astra 3000 was the only game they ever worked at. 

Character faces AI-generated and AI-pixelated
Intro music composed and produces by skooltan.
